metadata.name: Code-Mapper Competency Package
metadata.shortDescription: Competency package for OLAF code-mapper driven repository discovery and documentation workflows.
metadata.description: Competency focused on using OLAF code-mapper scripts and artifacts to understand repositories, discover tools and applications, and generate technical documentation and related assets.
objectives: Enable repository discovery based on OLAF code-mapper analyses
Support generation of structured documentation from code-mapper outputs
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Same class of models validated for core OLAF skills
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Python runtime and OLAF code-mapper scripts available in the workspace.
technical_requirements.platform_limitations: Assumes local access to repositories and ability to execute Python scripts.

entry_points.name: Generate Code-Mapper Documentation
entry_points.description: Generate structured technical documentation for a repository using OLAF code-mapper outputs.

entry_points.name: Analyze API Consistency with Code-Mapper
entry_points.description: Analyze API naming, parameter, and return-pattern consistency using code-mapper full foundation outputs.
